titleStmt.title: A new-years-gift for Doctor Witty, or, The dissector anatomized which is a reply to the discourse intituled, An answer to all that Doctor Tonstall has writ, or shall hereafter write, against Scarbrough spaw.
titleStmt.author: Tonstall, George, b. 1616 or 17.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.M. for the author,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
Attributed to George Tonstall. cf. NUC pre-1956.
